actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 111 of title 23, United States Code, relating to agreements for the use of and access to the rights-of-way of the Interstate System.

summary.text: Stipulates that nothing in agreements entered into between the Secretary of Transportation and a State highway department for the construction of projects on the Interstate System shall require the removal of establishments serving users of interstate highways if such establishment was in existence before January 1, 1960, is owned by a State, and if all access to and exits from such establishments conform to specified standards.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 111 of title 23, United States Code, relating to agreements for the use of and access to the rights-of-way of the Interstate System.
